short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send voucher to upstox user automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allow user to export the data from upstox dashboard to convey.in's web server where then the server will send emails to those user who created account in upstox
